column4: would anyone be able to point me to the proper search terms for a program that i could use to 'encrypt' a bunch of my random data before I upload it to a cloud service?
(NOT HELPFUL reply follows) "the cloud" is bad for freedom, YET you are obviously concerned with privacy/freedom as you want to encrypt things.
thats, i have exactly the same sentiment as you, however I am looking for a temporary/transition of my data. i dont want evil(tm) to get me on way through...
gpg can encrypt files as well
